name: MeWe Wider
description: An experimental style that aims to make the UI of the social network MeWe a lot more befitting for widescreen monitors. Tested on monitors that were 1440px and 1600px wide respectively.
additional_info:
Update 18th of December 2018 04:18 UTC: Attempted a(n in)complete overhaul of this style. This will possibly be the final update of the Stylish version of this style. For future updates, please use https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/master/Dandelion%20Sprout's%20Website%20Stretcher.txt with uBlock Origin instead.
Update 8th of July 2018 20:21 UTC: Fixed an issue where comments would be cut off in width when viewing some threads in media mode, and hopefully also one that'd cut off the emoji picker on screens that were â‰¤1700px.
Update 21st of May 2018 02:42 UTC: Fixed an issue with some windows overlapping on one's own userpage.
Update 21st of May 2018 02:36 UTC: Fixed an issue with some windows overlapping on userpages.
Update 21st of May 2018 01:27 UTC: Fixed an issue with unnecessarily wide comment threads if it was opened through notifications.
Update 21st of May 2018 00:39 UTC: Widened the account-search results.
Update 21st of May 2018 00:22 UTC: Widened the emoji picker.
Update 20th of May 2018 10:14 UTC: Added more spacing between the top-bar buttons.
Update 20th of May 2018 10:08 UTC: Fixed issue with textboxes.
Update 20th of May 2018 09:56 UTC: Improved support for full-window chats.
